      <script type="text/javascript">
       var $s = jQuery.noConflict();
      $s.easing.easeInOutSine = function (x, t, b, c, d) {
          return -c / 2 * (Math.cos(Math.PI * t / d) - 1) + b;
      }
      $s.easing.easeInOutQuint = function (x, t, b, c, d) {
          if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) return c / 2 * t * t * t * t * t + b;
          return c / 2 * ((t -= 2) * t * t * t * t + 2) + b;
      }
      $s(function () {
          $s('.fade').css('opacity', 0.1);
          $s('.fade').hover(function (event) {
              $s(this).stop().fadeTo("fast", 0.7);
          }, function (event) {
              $s(this).stop().fadeTo("fast", 0.1);
          });
          var userAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
          var isMobile = /(iphone|ipod|ipad|blackberry|android|palm|windows\s+ce)/.test(userAgent);
          if (isMobile) {
              $s('#slides').slides({
                  preload: true,
                  preloadImage: 'img/loading.gif',
                  randomize: true,
                  generatePagination: false,
                  generateNextPrev: false,
                  slideEasing: "easeInOutSine"
              });
          } else {
              $s('#slides').slides({
                  preload: true,
                  preloadImage: 'img/loading.gif',
                  randomize: true,
                  generatePagination: false,
                  generateNextPrev: false,
                  play: 9000,
                  pause: 2500,
                  hoverPause: true,
                  slideEasing: "easeInOutSine"
              });
          }
          $s(".newBooks").scrollable({
              easing: 'easeInOutQuint',
              next: '.scrollableOneNext',
              prev: '.scrollableOnePrev',
              circular: true,
              keyboard: false
          });
          $s(".classicBooks").scrollable({
              easing: 'easeInOutQuint',
              next: '.scrollableTwoNext',
              prev: '.scrollableTwoPrev',
              circular: true,
              keyboard: false
          });
      });
      </script>

            <p>
            </p>

            </p>
            <p>
